title: House for Sale or Rent
details:
Modern 2 story house built on 5 Perches. Land facing to Main Road. Approved Building Plan & CoC.

Ground Floor

Living Room
Dining Room
Kitchen
Common Bathroom
Garage
Front & Rear Garden

2nd FLOOR

TV Lounge
3 Bedrooms(A/C)
Balcony
One Common Bathroom

3rd FLOOR (Not Completed)

3.5 Million Per Perch × 5 = 17.5 MILLION
House Value = 10 Million
Total Sale Price = Rs 27.5 Million
If for rent, Monthly Rs.85000 (One Year Refundable Deposit)
